titles.title: To repeal the small business competitiveness demonstration program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Contracting and Technology .

bill.summary: 3/16/2009--Introduced. Amends the Business Opportunity Development Reform Act of 1988 to repeal the small business competitiveness demonstration program (the testing of innovative small business procurement methods and procedures).
